description: False indigo (Baptisia 'Ivory Towers') is an amazing species that is sure to bring dazzling beauty to any garden. This plant is known for its soft green foliage and deep purple flowers which rise up like towers of color in the summer. It is loved for its resilience and hardiness, able to grow in tough environments and remain low-maintenance. Its stunning sunset-inspired blooms are long-lasting and provide stunning color throughout the entire growing season. In addition to its beauty, false indigo provides attractive cover and food for butterflies. All in all, it's a great addition to any garden.
